lines.content: We're talking to people between the ages of 18 and 54 about their opinions on certain
products and I'd like to ask you a few questions.
First of all, are you between the ages of 18 and 54?
And are you between 18 and 34 years of age, or 35 and 54 years of age?
Do you usually smoke menthol or non-menthol cigarettes?
Do you usually smoke the regular king-size cigarettes or the cigarettes that
are longer than king-size -- that is, the 100 millimeter or the 120 millimeter
What is your regular brand of cigarettes -- that is, the brand you smoke most
often? (HAND RESPONDENT BRAND LIST AND POINT OUT THE SECTION IN WHICH HIS/HER
BRAND IS LISTED. THEN SAY: ) Which one of these is the specific type of (BRAND)
cigarettes that you smoke most often?
(RECORD THE FULL BRAND NAME AND THE LETTER WHICH FOLLOWS THE BRAND, EXACTLY AS
PRINTED ON THE BRAND LIST; IF NO LETTER APPEARS NEXT TO THE BRAND INDICATED
BY THE RESPONDENT, THANK AND TERMINATE. )
Do you usually buy your regular brand in a box or a soft paper pack?
